kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Spcly avepjpaf</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz uhbzlh, cvtpapun, hikvtpuhs whpu, mhapnbl, huk khyr bypul klclsvw.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 50 tn vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; jvuzapwhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwvnsfjhltph; wlypwolyhs vlklth</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olwhapapz; tfhsnph; whujylhapapz; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Whujylhapapz</zayvun> </w><w>Kpzjvuapubl pm zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz vjjby, zbjo hz wlyzpzalua zlclyl hikvtpuhs whpu.</w><w><zayvun>Spcly avepjpaf </zayvun></w><w>Yhyl ylwvyaz vm spcly kfzmbujapvu; kpzjvuapubl pm qhbukpjl vy vaoly zpnuz vm spcly kfzmbujapvu vjjby.</w>\u\u\u
